body:
I found a tutorial (link below) that describes how to assign the custom Radiance materials.  See page 27 for how to apply the materials to the surfaces - it definitely helps if the surfaces(materials) are separated by zone.


Hope this helps!




http://sustainabilityworkshop.autodesk.com/sites/default/files/core-page-files/bimforadvanceddaylighting_skripac_au2011.pdf






Regards,


Sandy Houck   LEED AP BD+C, LC
Brummitt Energy Associates, Inc.
619-531-1126
